name: Orb (itch) (Josh Maggard)
description:
Play as an orb who has the ability to absorb enemy abilities and techniques. After defeating enough enemies you gain the option to take their ability.

Controls

Move - WASD
Jump - Space
Interact - E

By Josh Maggard (@MaggardJosh) - Programming
Denver Poteet (@DenverSkyline) - Art

for Ludum Dare 24
